entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-09-26
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Dependency Injection using ILEmit is generating additional MSIL nop operations in the DynamicMethod #59624
  • Is there some best practice on prettify a json string #59622
  • Error in the documentation of the Task.ContinueWith method? #59620
  • emcc-props.json leads to wrong path for JsonToItemsTaskFactory.dll #59619
  • Running 'dotnet-serve' with .NET 6.0 RC1 ARM on an Apple M1: Nothing happens #59618
  • Improve documentation for System.Threading.Channels #59617
  • .NET 6rc1: The certificate data cannot be read with the provided password, the password may be incorrect. #59615
  • Test failure Loader/binding/tracing/BinderTracingTest.ResolutionFlow/BinderTracingTest.ResolutionFlow.sh #59614
  • Test failure baseservices/TieredCompilation/BasicTest_QuickJitOff/BasicTest_QuickJitOff.sh #59613
  • Run test baseservices/TieredCompilation/BasicTest_QuickJitOn_R2r/BasicTest_QuickJitOn_R2r.sh #59612
  • Test failure GC/Scenarios/ServerModel/servermodel/servermodel.sh #59611

Closed

  • [API Proposal]: Make it easier to append values to an array #59610

PullRequests

Created

  • Dependency Injection support for ValueTypes as Services #59625
    area-Extensions-DependencyInjection, community-contribution
  • Use cmakedefine in eglib config #59623
    community-contribution
  • Fixed wrong comment #59621
    area-System.Collections, community-contribution
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 1386804 #59616
    area-Infrastructure-libraries

Merged

  • FreeBSD12 version cleanup and process and thread enhancements #59339
    os-freebsd, community-contribution

Updated

  • Add tizen armel build CI for pull request #56281
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [wasm] Tracking aot failures, not meant to be merged #52004
    * NO MERGE *, arch-wasm
  • Fewer AddressExposedReason::TOO_CONSERVATIVE #59429
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Add ObjectDisposedException.Throw for object instance and type #58684
    new-api-needs-documentation
  • Guarded Devirt: multiple type checks #59604
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Support fast tailcalls in R2R #56669
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Prevent cache from being resized #59607
    area-Extensions-Caching, community-contribution
  • [draft][wasm] introduce typescript modules #59392
    arch-wasm, 7.0.0
  • Fix WinMD handling in System.Reflection.MetadataLoadContext #58344
    area-System.Reflection, community-contribution
  • [mono][jit] Eliminate some type comparisons in gshared methods. #59543
    * NO MERGE *, area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Update ConfigurationManager #59600
    area-Extensions-Configuration, community-contribution

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-09-26
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Remove DebuggerContractVersionCheck #56742
    17.0
  • `StackAllocArrayCreationExpressionSyntax.Update` does not account for the `stackAllocKeyword` parameter #56740
  • Error CS8032 An instance of analyzer System.Text.Json.SourceGeneration.JsonSourceGenerator cannot be created from (...) #56738

Closed

  • CompilerVisibleProperty semicolon escaping bug #51692

PullRequests

Created

  • Avoid emitting synthesized delegate types for delegates that are not referenced #56747
    Area-Compilers
  • Hook up NFW in OOP #56743
    Area-IDE, 17.0
  • Fix unused Update parameter #56741
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Merge main to features/inline_errors #56736
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, UX Review Not Required

Merged

  • Report correct severity for Hot Reload rude edits #56734
    Area-Interactive, Next
  • Add context.default.vs.core.version shared property to OOP telemetry session #56739
    Area-Interactive, Next
  • Merge main to features/list-patterns #56735
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, UX Review Not Required
  • Merge main to features/RawStringLiterals #56737
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, UX Review Not Required

Updated

  • Merge main to features/RawStringLiterals #56749
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Fix ALC in ProjectReference scenarios #56662
    Area-Compilers
  • Add documents to PDB for types that have no methods with IL #56278
    Area-Compilers
  • Update to the latest debugger contracts #56722
    Area-Interactive
  • Merge main to release/dev17.1-preview1 #56729
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts, UX Review Not Required
  • Merge main-vs-deps to release/dev17.1-preview1-vs-deps #56728
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts, UX Review Not Required
  • List-patterns: mitigate break with Length property patterns #56721
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - List Patterns
  • Target interactive host and tests to net6.0 #56705
    Area-Interactive
  • features/list-patterns #54864
    PR For Personal Review Only
  • Disable nullable analysis during EnC emit #56538
    Area-Compilers, Area-Interactive, New Language Feature - Nullable Reference Types

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-09-26
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Razor page call "component.razor" causes a problem in VS2022 #36995
  • Blazor Webassembly Integrity Check Fails - Publish #36994
  • Unknown error occurred while trying to verify Failed to find a valid digest in the 'integrity' attribute for resource wth computed SHA-256 integrity #36993
  • Response.Cookies.Append cannot set cookie value without encoding #36992
  • Loading an image with InputFile control doesn't work correctly and freeze the app. Blazor Server App targeting .NET 6 RC1 #36991
  • Reading form with invalid content throws NullReferenceException #36987
  • fail `dotnet watch run` CS0246 The type or namespace name 'App' could not be found #36985
  • Single file build time improvement: proxy-yarp #36982
  • Startup regression: mapaction #36981
  • An asp.net core web api application, using "UseWindowsService", reports an error “System.NotSupportedException: The content root changed. Changing the host configuration is not supported ” when starting the service #36979

Closed

  • Startup regression: updates #36974
  • Perf regression: connectionclosehttps #36980
  • SignalR can not get user identifier from ClaimsPrincipal #36918
  • Chrome (93) Disconnect SignalR Connection Exactly After 5 Minutes #36801
  • Startup improvement: endpoint, json #36943
  • Provide easy access to Razor page runtime metadata #34759
    Discussions

PullRequests

Created

  • Normalize the content root and improve errors #36990
    area-runtime, feature-minimal-hosting
  • Try `v5.0.401` .NET SDK #36989
    area-infrastructure
  • Remove FakeStartup classes #36988
    area-mvc, community-contribution
  • Use F# task ce in worker template #36986
    area-mvc, community-contribution

Merged

  • Fix constant name typos #36984
    area-runtime, community-contribution, 7.0-preview1

Updated

  • Get dotnet cores on Linux / macOS #36824
    area-infrastructure
  • Support binding to form and form file parameters in minimal actions #35158
    community-contribution, feature-minimal-actions, area-web-frameworks
  • [release/6.0] Fix http logging log typo #36950
    area-runtime
